product_description: Sophistication and ease combine on this chic sandal from Toni Pons, a company that has been making stylish espadrilles for over 50 years.
product_details_and_care:
Sophistication and ease combine on this chic sandal from Toni Pons, a company that has been making stylish espadrilles for over 50 years. With a slingback strap that features elastic bands for a comfy, custom fit and a lightly padded footbed and flexible sole, you'll want to wear this linen sandal all summer long.
2 1/2" heel; 3/4" platform (size 39).
Linen upper and lining/synthetic sole.
By Toni Pons; made in Spain.
Women's Shoes.
Item #1056901_1
